findings.message: Single-project fallback hard-codes dev.json, missing prd.json backward-compatible fallback
findings.suggestion: Add prd.json fallback in the single-project path detection
findings.rejectionReason: BotoolAgent.sh (launched by Coding skill) already has dev.jsonâ†’prd.json fallback logic at line 116-120. The Coding skill only starts the shell script, actual file selection happens there.

findings.message: No-registry mode sets PRD_DIR to empty tasks/ path when PROJECT_ID is empty
findings.suggestion: Preserve root PRD fallback when registry is missing
findings.rejectionReason: PRDReview Standalone mode derives PROJECT_ID from the source file path argument. When no argument is given, Step 0 uses AskUserQuestion. PROJECT_ID will not be empty in practice.
